titles.title: For the relief of Rafael Camacho, Rosa B. Camacho, and Rosa Camacho.
For the relief of Rafael Camacho, Rosa B. Camacho, and Rosa Camacho.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: Makes Rafael Camacho, Rosa B. Camacho, and Rosa Camacho each eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.
